taxonomicnotes: Sinibotia pulchra Wu, 1939 was described from Yangso, Li Kiang, southern China under its synonym Botia pulchra. Botia pulchra was transferred to Sinibotia pulchra by Kottelat (2004) and Tang et al. (2005). Under its synonym Botia gigantea, Sinibotia pulchra was described by Mai (1978) from northern Viet Nam.
rationale: Even though the species is relatively widespread there is no information on the species threats or population trends. The species occurs in areas that have been impacted by dams and water pollution, it is therefore assessed as Data Deficient.
